text: This is a great thread. Employment is a two-way relationship, and like it was well said above, you are the CEO of You before you're anyone's employee! Take care of your path first and the employers you work for will benefit because you will be doing the work you're meant to be doing, whether it's for a month or five years. Loyalty is nice, but again, it goes two ways.
